mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_no empNo , e.emp_name empName , e.emp_grade empGrade , (SELECT cd_nm FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'E001' AND cd = e.emp_dept) empDeptName , (SELECT cd_nm FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'E002' AND cd = e.emp_grade) empGradeName , e.sign_file signFile FROM employee e INNER JOIN file_upload f ON e.sign_file = f.file_no WHERE e.emp_no = #{empNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE employee e, file_upload f SET e.mod_time = NOW() , f.mod_time = NOW() WHERE e.sign_file = f.file_no AND e.emp_no = #{empNO}
mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_no empNo ,e.emp_name empName , e.emp_dept empDept ,(SELECT cd_nm FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'E001' AND cd = e.emp_dept) empDeptName , e.emp_grade empGrade , (SELECT cd_nm FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'E002' AND cd = e.emp_grade) empGradeName FROM employee e WHERE e.emp_grade > 1 AND e.emp_dept = #{approvalType} ORDER BY e.emp_grade DESC
SELECT cd departmentCode , cd_nm departmentName FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'E001'

e1.emp_no empNo
, e1.emp_name empName
, (SELECT cd_nm FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'E001' AND cd = e1.emp_dept) empDept
, (SELECT cd_nm FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'E002' AND cd = e1.emp_grade) empGrade
, e1.sign_file signFile
, ad.approval_doc_no approvalDocNo
, (SELECT cd_nm FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'S002' AND cd = ad.approval_type) approvalType
, (SELECT cd_nm FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'S001' AND cd = ad.approval_state) approvalStateName
, ad.approval_state approvalState , ad.doc_title docTitle , ad.doc_first_content docFirstContent , ad.doc_second_content docSecondContent , ad.doc_third_content docThirdContent , ad.approval_reason approvalReason , DATE(ad.start_date) startDate , DATE(ad.end_date) endDate , DATE(ad.reg_time) regTime , DATEDIFF(ad.end_date, ad.start_date) dayOffDays , fu.file_name fileName , fu.original_file_name originalFileName
, e2.emp_no firstApproval

, (SELECT cd_nm FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'E001' AND cd = e2.emp_dept) firstApprovalDeptName
, (SELECT cd_nm FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'E002' AND cd = e2.emp_grade) firstApprovalGradeName
, e2.sign_file firstApprovalSign

, e3.sign_file finalApprovalSign
, DATE(ad.final_approval_date) finalApprovalDate FROM approval_doc ad INNER JOIN employee e1 ON ad.emp_no = e1.emp_no INNER JOIN employee e2 ON e2.emp_no = ad.first_approval INNER JOIN employee e3 ON e3.emp_no = ad.final_approval LEFT JOIN file_upload fu ON ad.approval_doc_no = fu.reference_no WHERE ad.approval_doc_no = #{approvalDocNo}
